1. #### [City Council](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/148/City-Council)

   Learn about the Livingston City Council including member information and when regular meetings are held.
2. #### [Mayor](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/149/Mayor)

   Mayor Judy B. Cochran
3. #### [Election - Eleccion](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/266/Election---Eleccion)

   Election - Eleccion
4. #### [Code of Ordinances](https://www.municode.com/library/tx/livingston/codes/code_of_ordinances)

   View the City of Livingston's Code of Ordinances.
5. #### [Community Data](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/189/Community-Data)

   Find community data including Sales Tax Receipts, major employers, and learn about the economic base.
6. #### [Contact Us](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/214/Contact-Us)

   Learn how to contact the City of Livingston.
7. #### [Directory](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/directory.aspx)

   Find contact information for the departments of the City of Livingston.
8. #### [Economic Base](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/190/Economic-Base)

   Lake Livingston, one of the largest lakes in the State of Texas, was completed in 1973 and is located 15 miles west of Livingston on U.S. Highway 190. Lake Livingston, which covers approximately 90,000 surface acres, is an important tourist attraction and an economic asset to the City.
9. #### [Emergency Notification System](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/191/Emergency-Notification-System)

   The Blackboard Connect Emergency Notification system allows authorized City leaders, Police Department and Emergency personnel to rapidly alert citizens and subscribers to any situation affecting the safety and welfare of the City.

    View the City of Livingston's Public Information Request Form.
